title: Tyson Fury vs Braun Strowman: Gypsy King to make his WWE debut at Crown Jewel
text:
Tyson Fury will make his WWE debut at the Crown Jewel event in Saudi Arabia as he looks to end his feud with Braun Strowman.

The pair have come face to face on both Smackdown and Raw and will now settle their differences in the showpiece contest on October 31.

Fury said: "I just want to say how excited I am to be fighting the monster among men, Braun Strowman.

“But me being the undefeated lineal heavyweight boxing champion, I fear no man."

He added: "I’m going to knock Braun Strowman out."

Boxing promoter Bob Arum said: "Tyson Fury, the Gypsy King, he’s not only a great fighter, he reminds me of Muhammad Ali, George Foreman.

"He entertains in the ring and he is a tremendous personality."

The WWE also announced that Brock Lesnar and Cain Velasquez will be reigniting their UFC rivalry at the event.
description: The WWE announced two huge fights for their Crown Jewel PPV on October 31, with Fury set to face Strowman
